Master Answer:
Publicly funded (free) vaccines are available through health units, doctors' offices, and pharmacies (for those 5 years of age and older).  Services vary across BC. Your employer may offer vaccines through their occupational health program. Learn about what vaccines adults need here. Use our Health Unit Finder to find a health unit to make an appointment. 
Immunization Nurse
